title: Password protection
author: Cool34000
body_snippet:
We could lock access to folders or subfolders by asking a password

## Expected Behavior
Add a new option "password protect this folder" to folders and subfolders

## Current Behavior
Access to folder are not password locked (anyone can access to all connections)
Only the top level folder (called "connections" can be password locked (so the entire file or DB)

## Context
We are trying to allow access to some critical servers to only a few techs
By now, we use 2 modes to do this:
- MS...

iterations.description: This is a significant new feature (per-folder password protection) that requires deep architectural changes to the connection tree, encryption layer, and UI — scope is too large and complex for the current roadmap, and the issue has been open since 2019 with no upstream traction.

Approach: Would require adding per-folder encryption keys, password prompt on expand, and serialization support — out of scope for fork maintenance focus
